Trinity/Nightlight:::

Nigthlight hugged him and a tear rolled down. 

"UNCLE AEROTAUR!!!!!" shouted scared Trinity.

Nightlight moved quickly and open the door, Trinity was sat and 
looking to Aerotaur and Nightlight said.

"You won't leave me Uncle Aerotaur..."sobbed Trinity "Nightlight, 
Starstomp, Windlord and you, you won't go... you never will leave me 
alone!!!"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>        "I know but she's lost her parents and now her best friend.  
I just 
> thought she might want closure..."  He puts her down on her bed and 
closes 
> the door to talk to Nightlight.  "But you're probably right, it's 
pretty 
> gruesome."
